name:
Expertise It’s our people that make the difference. We offer you expertise all throughout the Software Development Life Cycle.
	
		User Acceptance Test – UAT
		Implementing Business Support Systems
		Test Automation
		DevOps
		Function and Intergration Test
		Low code and AI testing

Assessments Our software assessments result in easy-to-read reports – a quick and smooth route to informed decision-making.
	
		AI generated code analysis
		Technical Due Diligence
		Performance Check
		Health Check
		Improving Delivery Flow

Subscription Services For a fixed monthly fee, you get access to a wide range of QA expertise and competencies.
	
		Software Quality Dashboard
		Test Automation as a Service
		Performance Test as a Service
		Azure DevOps as a Service

Dedicated Team Looking for the right competence? We offer a number of different team models to support you.
	
		Nearshoring
		Extended Team
		Outsourcing
		Greenhouse
